code: // ------------------------------------------------------------------------ @Override public void onTaskFailure(Execution taskExecution, Throwable cause) {     // this strategy makes every task failure a global failure     executionGraph.failGlobal(cause). }
@Override public void notifyNewVertices(List<ExecutionJobVertex> newJobVerticesTopological) { // nothing to do }
@Override public String getStrategyName() {     return "full graph restart". }
@Override public FailoverStrategy create(ExecutionGraph executionGraph) {     return new RestartAllStrategy(executionGraph). }
